Product infomation

Our Scooter has following unique design and technology features:

  • Light aircraft grade aluminium frame

  • Car grade lithim battery

  • Self-balanced

  • Plug n play

  • Quick release adapter

  • RFID Key card

Multiple Accessories

There are Multiple mode for the Scooter for your multiple need.

    Golf Bag Rock

  • Material:Aluminium alloy

  • Color: Black

  • Capacity:45lbs

  • Ease:Steady & adjustable

    Shopping Rack

  • Material:Aluminium alloy

  • Color: Black

  • Capacity:45lbs

  • Ease:Steady & adjustable
